column1: The Celts were people in Iron Age and Medieval Europe who spoke Celtic languages and had cultural similarities

column4: the ways in which the Iron Age inhabitants of Great Britain and Ireland should be regarded as Celts has become a subject of controversy.The history of pre-Celtic Europe remains very uncertain. According to one theory
